metadata.title: CVE-2022-48798 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/cio: verify the driver availability for path_event callIf no driver is attached to a device or the driver does not provide thepath_event function, an FCES path-event on this device could end up in akernel-panic. Verify the driver availability before the path_eventfunction call.
